projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.content: Built a responsive portfolio website using React and Vite with dynamic blog pages and interactive design.

projects.title: Distributed Key-Value Store
projects.content: Developed a distributed key-value store with fault tolerance and replication using a basic consensus algorithm.

projects.title: HR Automation System
projects.content: Built a system to automate CV parsing, rating, and AI-based question generation for candidate evaluations.
